title: Wear Inactivity Coach
summary: A simple but fun notification tool that helps you take breaks during work
developerAddress:
Aeus Tech, Inc.
2nd Floor, Emmanuel Business Center,
Sen. Benigno Aquino Avenue, Diversion Road., Iloilo City
description: Wear Inactivity Coach is a simple and fun notification tool that helps you take breaks during work.- Sitting For Hours? Let your personal Coach remind you to take a break- Calling It A Day? Put your Coach to sleep at any time- Hire A Coach! Change your Coach to match your activities- Unlock more Coaches with different personalities (Some features require In-App Purchases)COMPATIBLE ANDROID WEAR DEVICES:Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch and/or Moto 360 running Android 4.3 or higherDesigned / Developed by AEUS TECH Inc.Say hello at info@aeustech.com
descriptionHTML:
Wear Inactivity Coach is a simple and fun notification tool that helps you take breaks during work.

- Sitting For Hours? Let your personal Coach remind you to take a break
- Calling It A Day? Put your Coach to sleep at any time
- Hire A Coach! Change your Coach to match your activities
- Unlock more Coaches with different personalities (Some features require In-App Purchases)

COMPATIBLE ANDROID WEAR DEVICES:
Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch and/or Moto 360 running Android 4.3 or higher

Designed / Developed by AEUS TECH Inc.
Say hello at info@aeustech.com
comments: Never got it working Samsung Galaxy S5. Would not open. Keep getting Unfortunately stopped working whenever I tried to open on phone.
Never got it to open or launch. Kept shutting down right after I installed it.
Pretty cool little app Just what I wanted. A reminder to stay active as I have an office job. So it's important to take a break and stretch out the legs, etc
Bird never happy, a bug? Told me to get up during a long walk! LG G watch
Exactly the sort of app I wanted it to be. Simple, fun little reminder to get up and walk around throughout the workday.
Tells me to get moving Right after I finish a 45 min walk
